      • getAllNotes

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/notes",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Optional<java.lang.Iterable<Note>>> getAllNotes()
                                                                                                                                                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        A request mapping for GET method to fetch all the notes in the H2 database.
        Returns:
        An exception or a response entity with the fetched Iterable notes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - A NoNotesExistException.

      • getOneNote

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/notes/{id}",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Optional<Note>> getOneNote(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long id)
                                                                                                                                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        A request mapping for GET request methods for getting a note specified by an id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the note to be fetched.
        Returns:
        An exception or a response entity with an error message or the found note.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - A CouldNotFindNoteException.

      • addNote

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/notes/",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Note> addNote(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                 Note note,
                                                                                                                                 org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder builder)
        Saves a new note on HTTP POST request.
        Parameters:
        note - The note to be added to database.
        builder - A UriComponentsBuilder object.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity which always returns a note object and 201 Status code.

      • modifyNote

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/notes/{id}",
                method=PUT)
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Optional<Note>> modifyNote(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                    Note note)
                                                                                                                                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Replaces a note object in the database if finds the id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the note to be replaced.
        note - The note to be saved.
        Returns:
        A response entity of an optional note or error message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - A CouldNotFindNoteException.

      • deleteNote

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/notes/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteNote(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long id)
                                                                                                                                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Mapping for the delete request method. Deletes a note if id is found.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the note to delete.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity with no content or error message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - A CouldNotFindNoteException
